text: [In jahudijon hamon] Kasone hastand, ki guftand: "Alloh taolo ʙo mo ahdu pajmon ʙastaast, ki ʙa hec pajomʙare imon najovarem, to [firistodae hamrohi xud] ʙarojamon qurʙonie ʙijovarad, ki otas [-i az soiqa ʙarxosta] onro [ʙa nisonai paziris] ʙisuzonad". [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigu: "Hatman, pes az man pajomʙarone ʙudand, ki daloili oskorro hamrohi on ci gufted, ʙarojaton ovardand. Agar rost megued, pas, caro ononro kusted
